rationale: Removed the debug flag so the Flask app no longer runs with debug mode enabled in production while preserving default behavior.
patch:
* Begin Patch
* Update File: /Users/justinexue/Downloads/flask-todo-app/app.py
@@
-if name == "main":
- app.run(debug=True)
+if name == "main":
+ app.run()
* End Patch
